input.sentences: the family was celebrating the son 's graduation from college .
he had just received his diploma about a week ago .
his grandparents came to see him .
his aunts and uncles came as well .
they sat around in a circle and congratulated him .
output.sentences: Today my family came to celebrate my son's graduation party.
This week he had received his college diploma.
His grandparents were so very proud of him.
His aunts and uncles even set up a special speech.
The kids all sat around in a circle and congratulated him one by one.
